title: main tera hun saibaa
lyrics:
Jawad :- main tera hun saibaa , Tu jahan main waheen

Tere rahon ka main kahkashan , Tu meri hai Chandni
Chitra:- Wafa ka tu hai jo aasaman , Main chaahat ki hun zameen

Do dilon ke hai darmiyaan , Ishq ki ye raoshni
Jawad :- Juda ek pal , Na honge ab , Aja ghar basaenge kaheen

Chitra:- Wo jane rab , Ye tae hai ab , Tu jo nahi main bhi nahi

Jawad :- Dil ki hai aarzoo , Tu rahe bas rubaru

Tere bin ye zindagi , Jism jai se be lahu

Chitra:- Teri yaadon ki thandi hawa , Mujhe le gayee waheen

Jisa jagah pe tum se hua , Samna ae ye dil nashee

Jawad :- Juda ek pal , Na honge ab , Aja ghar basaenge kaheen

Chitra:- Wo jane rab , Ye tae hai ab , Tu jo nahi main bhi nahi

Jawad :- Meri chahat ne ek angdaaee lee , Dekha tujhe jo maine

Mila tha pyaar ka samandar , Tishnagi bhi lagi thi badhne

Chitra:- Hai shuru meri aindagi tum se , Tumheen pe ye khatam hai

Mere dill pe tere qadomon ki , Aahaton ki qasam hai

Jawad :- Ho gaya dill ye year shaidaaee , Dikhe harsoo teri parchhaee

Chitra:- Juda ek pal , Na honge ab , Aja ghar basaenge kaheen

Jawad :- Wo jane rab , Ye tae hai ab , Tu jo nahi main bhi nahi


 كلمات:






 ألحان:






استمع إلى "main tera hun saibaa" على أنغامي
author: رقيب عالم
